statements: UPDATE blockchain_wallet_addresses SET wallet_address = '0x1234567890' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE blockchain_wallet_addresses SET user_name = 'Alice', created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE wallet_address = '0x0987654321';
UPDATE blockchain_wallet_addresses SET user_name = 'Alice', wallet_address = '0x123456789' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE blockchain_wallet_addresses SET created_at = '2023-01-15 08:30:00', wallet_address = '0x987654321' WHERE user_id = '87654321-12d3-a456-123e-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET wallet_address='0x1234567890abcdef' WHERE user_id='a1b2c3d4-e5f6-a7b8-9c00-d1e2f3a4b5c6'
